review: I have high speed internet and a router sitting right beside my TV. I bought 2 roku streaming sticks and they work about 25% of the time. Big waste of money.
author: Abbi

review: Working. BUT very limited options since outside of the US.VPN service didn't make it work, so I don't really have anything to do with it now...
author: Guy Tsror

review: very slow streaming capacity, expected better performance from a Roku brand.
author: lashun graves

review: works as good as my roku 3, at 1/2 the price.  I don't play games, but that is the big difference.
author: Michael Markowitz, L.

review: It won't pick up some Wifi signals.  My iPad (circa 2011) will pick up wireless signals when it is right next to the Roku.  Other than that, it is great.  I wish it had an ethernet port, but I'll have to upgrade Roku models for that.
author: RollTide
